Dominion League

The Dominion League is a free online tournament for competitive Dominion at all skill levels.

Sign Up

Each season of the Dominion League is a round robin tournament that lasts 6 weeks and is open to players of all levels. Competitors are placed into tiers based on their level and compete within the tiers to promote to a higher tier, or demote to a lower tier. The tournament is hosted on the Dominion Discord server. It is a fun and friendly competition where you can learn more about the game, play competitive Dominion and make friends.



New to Dominion?

Play Dominion using its official online client: dominion.games
